name: HRDM!NE Clk
description:
Install instructions

Windows XP not support!

Minimal System Requirements:

1.Windows Vista

2.32 bit x64

3.128 RAM

4. 1 GHZ

5. .NET Framework 4.0.0

Recomended System Requirements:

1.Windows 7 SP2

2.64 bit x86

3.1024 RAM

4. 1.4+ GHZ

5. .NET Framework 4.6.1

For x64 you should run:

Release/x64/Clicker.exe

For x86 you should run:

Release/x86/Clicker.exe
